metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7490 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
uWSGI before 2.0.17 mishandles a DOCUMENT_ROOT check during use of the--php-docroot option, allowing directory traversal.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7490` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1
libapache2-mod-ruwsgi - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1
libapache2-mod-uwsgi - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1
python-uwsgidecorators - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1
python3-uwsgidecorators - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1
uwsgi - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1
uwsgi-app-integration-plugins - 2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1

criterions.comment: uwsgi package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.15-10.2ubuntu2.1').
